name: Sam M.
content: Heya! My name is Sam or "Dior", I am slug gaming's Marketing Director and part time League of Legends caster. I am a Legal Studies major and Politics minor and will be entering my Senior year.  I enjoy playing board games and other TTRPGS, and have been in love with DnD for several years. I'm also an aspiring voice actress having worked in a few indie games.

name: Jeff Z.
content: Jeff "Jeffuz" Zhang (He/Him) is an upcoming 4th year studying Computer Engineering. He will be leading the production team and working on web/software development for the club. During his free time, Jeff enjoys playing League/Valorant, coding, and watching movies/shows.

name: Serene W.
content: Serene “suhrene” Wong (She/Her) is an upcoming 1st year Art and Design: Games and Playable Media major. She will be serving as the Events Director for Slug Gaming. In her free time, she enjoys playing League/TFT, watching videos/shows, and taking care of her plants. If there are any events you would want to see, feel free to reach out on discord @suhrene!
